casebody.data:
APPLIED MEDICAL RESOURCES CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. UNITED STATES SURGICAL CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant. No. 03-1030. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: Sept. 11, 2003.

Before NEWMAN, Circuit Judge, FRIEDMAN, Senior Circuit Judge, and RADER, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED: AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36
